content: Can anyone take part in this workshop (i.e. listen to the talks)? And is it necessary to register beforehand if your not a speaker?

You need to register (see the website), but one can always try to contact the organizers for a direct link.
I'm not the organizer...
Thanks for the clarification and sorry, I totally missed that the workshop was part of ETAPS 2021.
are registrations closed for this? I'd love to be a fly on the wall...
This page says it's sill open. Unfortunately, most other events are already finished.
see also #wg-formal-methods > RustVerify Workshop Zulip
